i18n.key: name identifying the area in Change. This name will be used as default alternative text.
Area description. Used as alternative text and tooltip
Select the one to be associated with the area among the resources : a link leading to the selected resource will be applied on the area.

Directly enter the valid Web address which must be associated with the area: a link leading to the entered address will be applied on the area - WARNING: this address is taken into account only if the "associated resource" field is empty!
